content: Fuban is a secret optional Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 2's secret area in Black Myth Wukong. Located in the Kingdom of Sahali locked away in the past, you'll need to help fulfill a drunken Boar's quest to access this area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fuban.md', within the main section titled 'Fuban'.
The content is as follows:
Fuban is a secret optional Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 2's secret area in Black Myth Wukong. Located in the Kingdom of Sahali locked away in the past, you'll need to help fulfill a drunken Boar's quest to access this area.
